All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
The Account class represents an account containing information such as name, email, password, associated company (if any), and balance.
AccountController
The AccountController class is a Spring REST controller responsible for handling account-related operations, such as registration, login, top-up, and payment.
Algorithm
The Algorithm class contains methods that implement various useful algorithms for working with collections and arrays.
BaseResponse<T>
A generic class for handling responses with success status, a message, and a payload.
BasicGetController<T extends Serializable>
A generic interface for providing basic CRUD operations with RESTful endpoints.
BookingThread
 
Bus
The Bus class represents a bus with various attributes such as name, facilities, price, capacity, departure and arrival stations, bus type, and schedules.
BusController
Controller class for handling operations related to buses.
BusType
Enumeration class BusType - in purpose for give Bus a Bus Type
City
Enumeration class City - for purpose give station class a city enum
Facility
Enumeration class Facility - for purpose give Bus class a facility
Invoice
The Invoice class represents an invoice containing information such as buyer ID, renter ID, bus rating, timestamp, and payment status.
Invoice.BusRating
Enum representing possible bus ratings.
Invoice.PaymentStatus
Enumeration representing payment status.
JBus
The JBus class is used to run the SPRING APP for the JBus application.
JsonAutowired
Annotation for JsonDBEngine to automatically load a JsonTable.
JsonDBEngine
Handle load and store for JsonTable
JsonTable<T>
Json Table is used to write and read JSON in every class or method that call json table
Payment
The Payment class is used to store information about payments made by users.
PaymentController
Controller class for handling payment-related operations.
Predicate<T>
 
Price
The Price class represents the price information for a bus ticket, including the base price and any applicable rebate.
Rating
The Rating class represents a simple rating system, allowing the insertion of ratings, calculating the average rating, and providing information about the total count and sum of ratings.
Renter
The Renter class represents a company renting buses, storing information such as company name, address, and phone number.
Review
The Review class represents a review containing information such as the date and description.
Schedule
The Schedule class represents a schedule for a bus, including the departure timestamp and seat availability.
Serializable
 
Station
The Station class represents a bus station, including its name, associated city, and address.
StationController
Controller class for handling station-related operations.
Type
The Type enum represents different types, such as rebate or discount, that can be used in various contexts.
Validate
The Validate class provides methods for filtering a list of Price objects based on certain criteria.
Voucher
The Voucher class is an abstract class that represents a voucher with a name, code, type, minimum price, and discount or rebate amount.
